# uptimekuma_notification_line (Resource)

LINE notification resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "uptimekuma_notification_line" "example" {
  name                 = "LINE Notification"
  channel_access_token = "your_channel_access_token"
  user_id              = "your_user_id"
  is_active            = true
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `channel_access_token` (String, Sensitive) LINE channel access token
- `name` (String) Notification name
- `user_id` (String) LINE user ID to send messages to

### Optional

- `apply_existing` (Boolean)
- `is_active` (Boolean)
- `is_default` (Boolean)

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) Notification identifier
